metadata.title: CVE-2023-31083 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/bluetooth/hci_ldisc.c in the Linuxkernel 6.2. In hci_uart_tty_ioctl, there is a race condition betweenHCIUARTSETPROTO and HCIUARTGETPROTO. HCI_UART_PROTO_SET is set beforehu->proto is set. A NULL pointer dereference may occur.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31083` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required
